name: Dr. Md. Maniruzzaman Khandaker
detail: Research/Teaching interests: Plant Pathology, Food Mycology, Aeromycology, Seed Pathology, Biostatistics, Quality Education,    Scouting

name: Dr. Kazi Shakhawath Hossain
detail: Experience: Gained a strong understanding of scientific methods during the course of 25 years of my professional career.

name: Dr. A.M.M. Golam Adam
detail: Research Area & Interest: Plant Physiology, Plant Biohemistry, Plant Nutrition, Horticulture, Physiological Ecology, Phytochemistry & Enzymes

name: Dr. Farhana Islam Khan
detail: Research interests: Biological and environmental research activities, specifically in the area of of Microbial Biotechnology & Aquatic and Food Microbiology.

name: Dr. Nusrat Sultana
detail: About: I am a plant biologist with research expertise in cytogenetics, molecular genetics, plant genomics, and bioinformatics. I have research interests in plant genome evolution with special focus on repetitive DNA, transposable elements, phylogeny, polyploidy and genome size evolution of plant genome.

name: Dr. Sumi Akter
detail: Research Interests: 1. Microbiology,2. Microbial ecology,3. Microbial systematics, 4. Microbial DNA barcoding, 5. Microbial genomics and transcriptomics, 6. Food microbiology and Infectious diseases)

name: Dr. Ripa Akter Sharmin
detail: About: Novel candidate gene identification in response to various biotic and abiotic stresses through Bioinformatics tools, Transcriptome analysis, and Genome wide association study (GWAS); Genetic improvement of Rice, soybean and Chickpea through biotechnological approaches such as overexpression and CRISPR/CAS9; Differential Gene expression analysis from RNA-Seq data; Physiological, Biochemical and molecular analysis of plants under various abiotic stresses such as flooding and drought.

name: Dr. Mohammad Ali
detail: Research Interests: 1. Microbiology and Microbial Biotechnology, 2. Environmental Chemistry, 3. Environmental Biotechnology, 4. Water pollution, 5. Wastewater treatment (Nitrification, Partial Nitrification, ANAMMOX)
